OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The token of the user who represents the connector in the OpenCTI platform.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope or type of data the connector is importing, either a MIME type or Stix Object (for information only).

CONNECTOR_TYPE.description: Should always be set to EXTERNAL_IMPORT for this connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: Determines the verbosity of the logs.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: Duration between two scheduled runs of the connector (ISO 8601 format).

SEKOIA_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate requests to the Sekoia service.

SEKOIA_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for accessing the Sekoia API.

SEKOIA_COLLECTION.description: Allows you to specify the collection to query in order to retrieve or manage indicators of compromise.

SEKOIA_START_DATE.description: The date to start consuming data from. May be in the formats YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00.

SEKOIA_LIMIT.description: The number of elements to fetch in each request. Defaults to 200, maximum 2000.

SEKOIA_IMPORT_SOURCE_LIST.description: Create the list of sources observed by Sekoia as label.

SEKOIA_IMPORT_IOC_RELATIONSHIPS.description: Import IOCs relationships and related objects.
